page.title: 04Transport by Sea
page.content: {AN INTERVIEW WITH MR DAVID STEDEFORD Q.How many boats do you own? A.We have four altogether. Q.What are they called? A.Commodore,Faldor,Nemo and Falcon. Q.How many people can they carry? A.The Commodore can carry 100, the Faldor 60, the Nemo 54, Falcon 12. Q.Are they always working? A.We have four working through the summer months but during the Winter they are laid up two at a time for maintainance work. Q.Where do they sail to? A.We sail to all the other inhabited islands. In the winter it's mainly St Mary's. Q.What kind of trips do you do? A.We do circular trips for visitors to the islands to see birds and seals and light-houses and the other inhabited and unihabited islands.
